alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley; Catalina and Santa Barbara Islands; Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Eastern San Gabriel Mountains; San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands; Santa Susana Mountains; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Western Antelope Valley Foothills; Western San Fernando Valley; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 11 at 3:35AM PST until January 11 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 to 70 mph expected. Isolated wind gusts up to 80 mph possible. * WHERE...Portions of southwest California. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
